title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
description: When creating a new project, it is expected that the bin directory can be scrubbed to remove any previous build artifacts. However, there is currently a bug preventing this confirmation process from occurring.
OB: When creating a new project, there is no confirmation that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
EB: When creating a new project, a confirmation prompt should appear asking if the bin directory can be scrubbed.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application. 2. Click on 'Create New Project'. 3. Observe that there is no confirmation prompt asking if the bin directory can be scrubbed.
